stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards discover magical 'thought-knots' in young minds!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Wizards' Guild has uncovered a wondrous secret within the minds of young apprentices. Beyond simply clearing old pathways, these growing minds forge new, intricate clusters of magical connections. These "thought-knots" appear only in the years of youth, vital for shaping complex enchantments and higher-level thinking.
